list_definition.definition: the idea or effect produced in someone’s mind by a person, experience etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The film made a great impression on me.
I have the impression that he’s not pleased.

list_definition.definition: the mark left by an object on another object

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The dog left an impression of its paws in the wet cement.

list_definition.definition: a single printing of a book etc.

list_ex_of_english: The first impressions afforded by this book are not altogether reassuring.
